33.eng-name: Retiring to a Mosque for Remembrance of Allah (I'tikaf)

hadiths.text: Narrated `Urwa:Aisha during her menses used to comb and oil the hair of the Prophet (ﷺ) while he used to be in I`tikaf in the mosque. He would stretch out his head towards her while she was in her chamber

chapter.ara-name: باب الْمُعْتَكِفِ يُدْخِلُ رَأْسَهُ الْبَيْتَ لِلْغَسْلِ
chapter.eng-name: A Mu'takif can let his head in the house for washing
